Background.text:
Organic Solvent
Precursor in rubber industry
Also a metabolite of drug Disulfiram

Mechanism_of_Toxicity.text: Disruption of enzymes and metabolic pathways including in the CNS
Disruption of enzymes and metabolic pathways including in the CNS

Clinical_Features.text:
Eye irritation
Skin irritation
CNS depression

Evaluation.text: Based on clinical history and presenting signs and symptoms

Management.text:
Decontaminate
Consider
activated charcoal
for oral ingestions
No specific antidotes available

References.text: Olson, K. Poisoning and Drug Overdose, 1999.
